detaileddescription.para: cuPHY Beamforming weight compute handle
cuPHY BfwTx handle

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int nBSAnts, unsigned int nLayers, unsigned int Nprb, cuphyTensorDescriptor_t tDescH, const void *HAddr, cuphyTensorDescriptor_t tDescLambda, const void *lambdaAddr, cuphyTensorDescriptor_t tDescCoef, void *coefAddr, cuphyTensorDescriptor_t tDescDbg, void *dbgAddr, cudaStream_t strm)
memberdef.name: cuphyBfcCoefCompute

memberdef.argsstring: (cuphyBfwCoefCompHndl_t *pBfwCoefCompHndl, uint8_t enableCpuToGpuDescrAsyncCpy, uint8_t compressBitwidth, uint16_t nMaxUeGrps, uint16_t nMaxTotalLayers, float lambda, void *pStatDescrCpu, void *pStatDescrGpu, void *pDynDescrsCpu, void *pDynDescrsGpu, void *pHetCfgUeGrpMapCpu, void *pHetCfgUeGrpMapGpu, void *pUeGrpPrmsCpu, void *pUeGrpPrmsGpu, void *pBfLayerPrmsCpu, void *pBfLayerPrmsGpu, cudaStream_t strm)
memberdef.name: cuphyCreateBfwCoefComp

briefdescription.para: Allocate and initialize a cuPHY beamforming coefficient compute object.

detaileddescription.para: Allocates a cuPHY beamforming coefficient compute object and returns a handle in the address provided by the caller.

Returns CUPHY_STATUS_INVALID_ARGUMENT if pStatDescrCpu and/or pStatDescrGpu and/or pDynDescrsCpu and/or pDynDescrsGpu and/or pHetCfgUeGrpMapCpu and/or pHetCfgUeGrpMapGpu and/or pUeGrpPrmsCpu and/or pUeGrpPrmsGpu and/or pBfLayerPrmsCpu and/or pBfLayerPrmsGpu is NULL
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_SUCCESS if allocation and initialization were successful.
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_ALLOC_FAILED if a BfwCoefComp object cannot be allocated
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_SUCCESS if allocation and initialization were successful

parameterdescription.para: - Address to return the new instance
- flag if non-zero enables async copy of CPU descriptor into GPU
- Number of bits to use for block floating point compression of weights (0 is uncompressed)
- Max total number of UE groups to be processed in a single API invocation
- Maximum total beamformed layers (i.e. sum of layer count across all UE groups) to be processed in a single API invocation
- regularization constant
- Pointer to static descriptor in CPU memory
- Pointer to static descriptor in GPU memory
- Pointer to dynamic descriptors in CPU memory
- Pointer to dynamic descriptor in GPU memory
- Pointer to heterogenous config to UE group map descriptor in CPU memory
- Pointer to heterogenous config to UE group map descriptor in GPU memory
- Pointer to UE group parameter descriptor in CPU memory
- Pointer to UE group parameter descriptor in GPU memory
- Pointer to beamforming layer parameter descriptor in CPU memory
- Pointer to beamforming layer parameter descriptor in GPU memory
- CUDA stream for descriptor copy operation

briefdescription.para: Allocates and initializes a cuPHY BFW pipeline.

detaileddescription.para: Allocates a cuPHY Downlink Beamforming Weight (BFW) computation pipeline for Downlink and returns a handle in the address provided by the caller.
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_INVALID_ARGUMENT if pBfwTxHndl and/or pStatPrms is NULL.
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_ALLOC_FAILED if a BfwTx object cannot be allocated
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_SUCCESS if allocation and initialization were successful.

parameterdescription.para: - Address to return the new BFW pipeline instance
- Pointer to BFW static parameters to be used in pipeline creation
- CUDA stream used for creation time work (e.g static tensor copy, conversion)

briefdescription.para: Destroys a cuPHY beamforming coefficient compute object.

detaileddescription.para: Destroys a cuPHY Pbeamforming coefficient compute object that was previously created by cuphyCreateBfwCoefComp. The handle provided to this function should not be used for any operations after this function returns.
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_INVALID_ARGUMENT if puschRxChEstHndl is NULL.
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_SUCCESS if destruction was successful.

parameterdescription.para: - handle to previously allocated BfwCoefComp instance

briefdescription.para: Destroys a cuPHY BFW receiver pipeline object.

detaileddescription.para: Destroys a cuPHY Downlink Beamforming Weight (BFW) computation object that was previously created by cuphyCreateBfwTx. The handle provided to this function should not be used for any operations after this function returns.
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_INVALID_ARGUMENT if bfwTxHndl is NULL.
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_SUCCESS if destruction was successful.

parameterdescription.para: - handle to previously allocated BfwTx instance

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t nMaxUeGrps, uint16_t nMaxTotalLayers, size_t *pStatDescrSizeBytes, size_t *pStatDescrAlignBytes, size_t *pDynDescrSizeBytes, size_t *pDynDescrAlignBytes, size_t *pHetCfgUeGrpMapSizeBytes, size_t *pHetCfgUeGrpMapAlignBytes, size_t *pUeGrpPrmsSizeBytes, size_t *pUeGrpPrmsAlignBytes, size_t *pBfLayerPrmsSizeBytes, size_t *pBfLayerPrmsAlignBytes)
memberdef.name: cuphyGetDescrInfoBfwCoefComp

briefdescription.para: Helper to compute cuPHY beamforming coefficient compute descriptor buffer sizes and alignments.

detaileddescription.para: Computes cuPHY beamforming coefficient compute descriptor buffer sizes and alignments. To be used by the caller to allocate these buffers (in CPU and GPU memories) and provide them to other BfwCoefComp APIs

Returns CUPHY_STATUS_INVALID_ARGUMENT if pStatDescrSizeBytes and/or pStatDescrAlignBytes and/or pDynDescrSizeBytes and/or pDynDescrAlignBytes and/or pHetCfgUeGrpMapSizeBytes and/or pHetCfgUeGrpMapAlignBytes and/or pUeGrpPrmsSizeBytes and/or pUeGrpPrmsAlignBytes and/or pBfLayerPrmsSizeBytes and/or pBfLayerPrmsAlignBytes is NULL
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_SUCCESS otherwise

parameterdescription.para: - Max total number of UE groups to be processed in a single API invocation
- Maximum total beamformed layers (i.e. sum of layer count across all UE groups) to be processed in a single API invocation
- Size in bytes of beamforming coefficient compute static descriptor
- Alignment in bytes of beamforming coefficient compute static descriptor
- Size in bytes of beamforming coefficient compute dynamic descriptor
- Alignment in bytes of beamforming coefficient compute dynamic descriptor
- Size in bytes of hetergenous config to UE group map descriptor
- Alignment in bytes of hetergenous config to UE group map descriptor
- Size in bytes of UE group parameter descriptor
- Alignment in bytes of UE group parameter descriptor
- Size in bytes of beamforming layer descriptor
- Alignment in bytes of beamforming layer descriptor

briefdescription.para: Run cuPHY BFW computation pipeline in specified mode.

detaileddescription.para: Call triggers cuPHY Downlink Beamforming Weight (BFW) computation pipeline execution in mode specified by procModeBmsk
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_INVALID_ARGUMENT if bfwTxHndl is NULL and/or procModeBmsk is not supported.
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_SUCCESS if BfwTx execution is successful.

parameterdescription.para: - Handle of BfwTx instance which is to be triggered
- Processing mode bitmask containing one or more processing modes applicable during this execution

memberdef.argsstring: (cuphyBfwCoefCompHndl_t bfwCoefCompHndl, uint16_t nUeGrps, cuphyBfwUeGrpPrm_t const *pUeGrpPrms, uint8_t enableCpuToGpuDescrAsyncCpy, cuphySrsChEstBuffInfo_t *pChEstBufInfo, uint8_t **pBfwCompCoef, cuphyBfwCoefCompLaunchCfgs_t *pLaunchCfgs, cudaStream_t strm)
memberdef.name: cuphySetupBfwCoefComp

briefdescription.para: Setup cuPHY beamforming coefficient compute object for calculation.

detaileddescription.para: Setup cuPHY beamforming coefficient compute object in preparation towards execution for generating coefficients
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_SUCCESS if setup is successful.
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_INVALID_ARGUMENT if bfwCoefCompHndl and/or pUeGrpPrms and/or pChEstBufInfo and/or pBfwCompCoef and/or pLaunchCfgs is NULL.

parameterdescription.para: - Handle to previously created BfwCoefComp instance
- total number of UE groups to be processed
- Pointer to array of UE group parameters
- Flag when set enables async copy of CPU descriptor into GPU
- Pointer to array of SRS channel estimation information buffers
- Pointer to array of compressed beamforming weights
- Pointer to beamforming coefficient compute launch configurations
- CUDA stream for descriptor copy operation

detaileddescription.para: Setup cuPHY Downlink Beamforming Weight (BFW) computation pipeline (and its components) state in preparation towards slot execution
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_INVALID_ARGUMENT if bfwTxHndl and/or pDynPrms and/or batchPrmHndl is NULL
Returns CUPHY_STATUS_SUCCESS if allocation and initialization were successful.

parameterdescription.para: - Handle of BFW instance to be setup
- Dynamic parameters carrying information needed for slot processing

briefdescription.para: Run cuPHY save BFW computation debug buffer.

parameterdescription.para: - Handle of BfwTx instance which saves the debug buffer
- CUDA stream used for BfwTx pipeline execution Note: requires stream synchronization durring call

simplesect.para: CUPHY_STATUS_SUCCESS, CUPHY_STATUS_INVALID_ARGUMENT Note: requires stream synchronization during call

briefdescription.para: This section describes beamforming coefficient computation functions of the cuPHY application programming interface.

detaileddescription.para: This section describes the Beamforming weight computation pipeline functions of the cuPHY application programming interface.
